name: Blast Raccoon 3
description:
Blast Raccoon is back in an epic journey that is filled with all kinds of unique levels while feeling like a retro 16-bit video game! COntrols are in game and I hope you have fun!

Made and ™ by: FUNCAGE ENTERTAINMENT!

Pixel art used by Piskel!

LMMS for music!

SL Smart Mind for helping!
